body_html:
What are "generalized providers"?

If you're interesting in making a rules_swig project for Bazel, I would recommend having a conversation with @lberki and @ulfjack beforehand. Internally at Google we have a solution for this called py_wrap_cc. But it wasn't open sourced. Probably because Swig was a hard problem to solve and required peculiarities that wouldn't make sense outside of Google.

body:
What are "generalized providers"?

If you're interesting in making a rules_swig project for Bazel, I would recommend having a conversation with @lberki and @ulfjack beforehand. Internally at Google we have a solution for this called py_wrap_cc. But it wasn't open sourced. Probably because Swig was a hard problem to solve and required peculiarities that wouldn't make sense outside of Google.
